entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
